meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brian Kato Lisa Rhae Burgess Austin Rogers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7608.

td.p: Brian Kato, a State Department contractor from Washington, D.C.
Lisa Rhae Burgess, a retired high school teacher from Surfside Beach, South Carolina
Austin Rogers, a bartender from New York, New York (whose 11-day cash winnings total $394,700)

tr.td: TV SITCOMS BY MOM
(Alex: We'll give you the mom.)
THEY'RE HISTORY!
ACC SCHOOLS
B OFF!
CARVE OUT
A PLACE FOR YOURSELF
